name: Laser 1000000 Beams Joke
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Laser.
1000000 Laser Beams Joke - this is a game simulation of a joke application where you can play on your phone like a laser. Love the beautiful laser? You a small beam and you want them more and more? For realism used camera! Collect the most rays! Discover all the unique lasers from the store! Reach the first rays of a million!
Use our safe laser pointer! With this laser simulator you can play and be sure not to anyone not harm!
Make fun by playing and compete with their friends and loved ones!
Warning game joke created for pranks and practical jokes and is absolutely safe for your health!
Thank you for playing our games and applications! Leave us feedback and we will try to make them even more interesting!
